We hope this message finds you well. As you know, our parks, including Kelly's Lock, Felix Dam Park, and Jim Dietrich Park, are treasured parts of our community, offering beautiful natural settings for everyone to enjoy. Read on...

As you prepare for picnics and gatherings with friends and family over the summer please keep safe social distancing practices and adherence to fireworks laws as part of your weekend planning. Read on...
Did you know? ?That Safety Net Sanctuary is the Animal Control Service responsible for handling 30 Municipalities in Berks County. Read on...
Subscribe to Notify Me to receive updates and information about community news and happenings. Read on...
